item.title: CalmCheck: A Fast, Smart Health Companion
item.description: CalmCheck is a lightweight, responsive mobile health companion that delivers personalized AI guidance for everyday symptoms with real-time trusted health news and smart local data handling.

item.title: BabySwap: Community Babysitting Exchange Web App
item.description: BabySwap is a collaborative community babysitting exchange platform built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Jest, and Playwright.

item.title: A Comparative Study on Deep Learning Methods for Protein Sequence Classification
item.description: This research benchmarks RNN, LSTM, and Transformer models for classifying protein sequences using amino acid embeddings from UniProt.

item.title: A Study on Personalized Travel Route Recommendation Using LSTM
item.description: A research project exploring GPS trajectory clustering and LSTM sequence modeling to provide personalized travel routes with time information.

item.title: Puding: Your Coding Mate
item.description: Project PUDING is a mobile app that motivates users to practice coding daily by guiding them through goal setting, solving problems, and submitting proof to earn rewards.

item.title: Jelp: Restaurant Recommendation and Analysis Website
item.description: Project JELP is a members-only restaurant recommendation platform that lets logged-in users browse, select, and manage restaurant rankings and detailed information.

item.title: JOB-ARCHIVE: Developer Job Posting Service
item.description: JOB-ARCHIVE is a developer-focused job listing platform with category pages, tag-based filtering, and personalized alerts built with React, Node.js, and MySQL.
